meanings.definition: To look upward in admiration or wonder.
meanings.sent1: She was upgazing at the stars, feeling amazed by their beauty.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys upgazing at the clouds, finding peace in their shapes.
meanings.sent3: While upgazing at the sky, she almost bumped into a tree.
meanings.sent4: His upgazing eyes followed the bird soaring high above.
meanings.sent5: Upgazing at the rainbow, she felt a sense of joy and wonder.

meanings.sent1: His upgazing filled him with a sense of awe at the vastness of the sky.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of the stars captured her attention during her upgazing.
meanings.sent3: During his upgazing, he noticed a squirrel peeking down from a branch.
meanings.sent4: The upgazing of the children watching the fireworks was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The upgazing of the crowd at the hot air balloons was a colorful spectacle.
